column2:
A noise wakes you from your slumber.
In front of you is an hideous pink bat-winged monstrosty with antennae where its head should logically be.
With a strange buzzing they proceed to speak to you...

'We are the Mi-Go from Yuggoth, we have travelled far from your future to study these times...'
'You appear to be a likely candidate for our experiment. We will make you an offer...'
'In return for immortality you will agree to be our agent in this aeon...'
'recording the history of these dark times from the view point of the worlds leaders.'

'This will of course require a certain amount of surgery to get your brain where we need it.'
If I Hide Under the Bedsheets...

You wake up in the morning to the smell of ozone and soiled bedsheets.

There are strange burn marks on the floor near your bed.

You doubt that anyone sane will believe your excuses.

The Alien waves their appendages in approval and tells you that they will return within the decade to conduct the next stage of the experiment, when you will obtain your new body.\n\nBe careful not to die in the meantime.

It is time. The Mi-Go are implementing the next phase of their experiment and you will depart both your body and this land.

They transport you to their laboratory and prepare the canister where your brain will be hosted till they find a sutable victim for the next stage of the experiment.

Will anybody in $COUNTRY$ notice that their leader is now a mindless husk?
I Hate The Sound Of That Saw...

After what seems like an eternity your brain is transplanted into a new human receptacle.

A new body and a new country awaits...

Will anyone notice the change in the behaviour of their leader?

Will they accept a new direction?

Once more in the night the thing has returned! As the world plunges towards it's final reckoning it speaks...

'This is the exact point we were hoping to position you. No more switching from now on, the experiment will succeed or fail based on your actions here.'

'We will return at the end and reward you should you complete your role.'

For the final time your sleep is disturbed by the intruders...

'We will in a while take you to the Great Library on Yuggoth, where, as promised, your brain tube will act as a permanent, everlasting record of the experiment for all time.'

'We are not totally heatless, we have selected another tube dweller to keep you company for eternity. They too are an observer, but from an alternate Earth future, and in human form had gone by the name of Drew...'

The Mi-Go have left you in a dangerous situation.

You are now the advisor to the Mad Emperor, Castaigne, in the realm of Imperial America!

Worse still, the Hasturians, followers of the King in Yellow, are the avowed enemies of the Mi-Go! You will need to tread carefully to maintain your cover.

The Mi-Go have placed you in a sticky situation.

The Cultists are in control of this country and you are now their leader!

You should be able to stave off the country's enevitable envelopment by the Eldritch forces but will the cultists accept this, or will they rise up with you becoming just another sacrifice to their vile gods?
After which they will return to relocate you (or at least your brain).
